unit.utterance: Dāstāne film tuye yek mazraei dārad etefāq mioftad
unit.utterance_translation: the story takes place in a farm

unit.utterance: baad yek āqāyi rā nešān midahad ke dārad golābihāye xeyli dorošti rā az deraxt mičinad
unit.utterance_translation: A man is picking big pears from a tree

unit.utterance: baad golābihā rā migozārad tuye lebāsaš miāyad mirizad tuye sabad se tā sabad rā čide bude pāyine deraxt
unit.utterance_translation: he puts the pears in his clothes, climbs down the tree and puts them all in the basket, there were three baskets down the tree

unit.utterance: baad nešān midahad ke yek pesarbačeyi albatte xob ānjā masalan hastand miāyamadand miraftand ādamhāye digar ham budand masalan yeki bā gāvaš miāyad rad mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: other people pass by, for instance somebody came with a cow

unit.utterance: baad yek pesarbačeyi bā dočarxe miāyad vaqti ke dārad az kenāre in deraxt rad mišavad mibinad ke se tā sabade golābi ānjā ast
unit.utterance_translation: then a little boy comes and while he is passing by the tree he notices three baskets of pears

unit.utterance: yek negāhi aval miandāzad bebinad āqāhe havāsaš hast sāhebe golābihā mibinad na havāsaš nist
unit.utterance_translation: he looks at the man on the tree to see whether he is watching him or not

unit.utterance: sabade golābi rā migirad migozārad jeloye dočarxeaš bā dočarxeaš hamintor ke miraft yek koluxi jeloyaš bud, in mixorad be ān kolux va mioftad
unit.utterance_translation: he takes the basket and puts it in front of his bike, while he was riding, his bike hits a rock and he falls down

unit.utterance: bā dočarxe mioftad ruye zamin baad alāve bar inke kolāhaš mioftad sabadaš vājgun mišavad tamāme golābihā mirizad ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: his hat falls down too and all the pears spills out of the basket

unit.utterance: baad se tā pesarbačeye hamsenosālaš dārand az ānjā rad mišavand
miāyand beheš komak mikonand ham in rā boland mikonand ham golābihāyaš rā jam mikonand tuye sabad migozārand
unit.utterance_translation: they come to help him get up, gather his pears and put them back into the basket

unit.utterance: va in be rāhaš edāme midahad
baad in āqāhe ke sāhebe golābihā ast az deraxt ke miāyad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: the man who owns the pears climbes down the tree

unit.utterance: aval negāh mikonad mibinad yeki az sabadhāyaš kam šode ast mišomarad mibinad ke bale sabadaš rā dozd borde
unit.utterance_translation: he takes a look at the baskets and found out that one of them is not there, he counted and yes one of the baskets was stolen

unit.utterance: baad in se tā pesare kolāhe ān pesare dozd dastešān bud dārand az kenāre inhā rad mišavand baad in hamintor negāh mikonad fekr konam šak karde ke inhā bardāštand vali kāri az dastaš bar nemiāyad.
unit.utterance_translation: the boys had the little boy's hat, they are passing by the man, and he was looking at them wondering whether they have taken the basket but he couldn't do anything about it.
